113a3('bum): de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir nan/ koru shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni zhan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
113a4('bum): kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten da yin no// de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ba ngan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shig gzungs
113a5('bum): kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar
113a6('bum): gyi rten yin no// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / 
113a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams la
113a8('bum): brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka mi 'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi
113b1('bum): dang lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brtan par bya/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko Ta shi ga so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / 
113b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po la brta/ 
113b3('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi
113b4('bum): dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brtan par bya/ ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka sangs
113b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
113b6('bum): dgun gyi rten yin no// de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
113b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
113b8('bum): brtan pa bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
114a1('bum): rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lham yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ dpa'i phyi na
114a2('bum): ko'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye
114a3('bum): dgu'i ba kyi rten yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyag/ das po brgya gnyis pa/ ko dz+ra shi ga rigs kyi
114a4('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gsheg ngas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i daphyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag
114a5('bum): tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ de lan ma 'tshe'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / 
114a6('bum): lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil snyan mang pos rim
114a7('bum): gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka da la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de'i bsod nams
114a8('bum): ming du 'phel lam brgya byin gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang / 
114b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
114b2('bum): yid la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 
114b3('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed mchod par byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches
114b4('bum): mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi/ dko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la dal zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
114b5('bum): ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'di/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su
114b6('bum): bkang ste de dag la nam 'tshe'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / 
114b7('bum): lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ 
114b8('bum): mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // 
115a1('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 
115a2('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral lo// gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa
115a3('bum): dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshog ci rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams
115a4('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de debazhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
115a5('bum): mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod
115a6('bum): rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas
115a7('bum): kyi byug pa dang lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi
115a8('bum): sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
115b1('bum): mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am
115b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas ste/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris
115b3('bum): shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed
115b4('bum): bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
115b5('bum): rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi ko'u shi ka ga la te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
115b6('bum): mchod pa'i phyir/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bur 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam
115b7('bum): 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza'/ 
115b8('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gro byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ 
116a1('bum): ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // 
116a2('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas shing
116a3('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bris shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang
116a4('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tsho/ dgas kyis rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed
116a5('bum): phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phe la lo// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi yongs su bkang ba
116a6('bum): lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong
116a7('bum): gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 
116a8('bum): lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi/ 
116b1('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ 
116b2('bum): de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das
116b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub pa dang / 
116b4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / 
116b5('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams
116b6('bum): 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa
116b7('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed
116b8('bum): pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi/ 
117a1('bum): chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ 
117a2('bum): bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du dang / mchod par byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 
117a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
117a4('bum): 'di bris shing 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / dme tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 
117a5('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro ra byed bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par
117a6('bum): byed na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum
117a7('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can re res de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun las
117a8('bum): byas pa'i mchod rten 'bang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag byas ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang lha rdzas kyi
117b1('bum): spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phyem dang lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyin bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / sgra rdzas kyi bang/ 
117b2('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang po rim grong byas/ bkur bstir byas phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
117b3('bum): bris shing bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi
117b4('bum): 'bral bar bya ste/ de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
117b5('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nam/ sa ches mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom
117b6('bum): ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur bstir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa
117b7('bum): dang / mchod par bgyis pas ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur
117b8('bum): bstir bgyis pa dang / phu dud du bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de
118a1('bum): ngag las sems can re re'i kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad
118a2('bum): tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis ste/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lha mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi
118a3('bum): byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyi
118a4('bum): rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dungad du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig
118a5('bum): mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag
118a6('bum): tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi
118a7('bum): byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi bdun dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror
118a8('bum): bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'chis pa
118b1('bum): de dag las// sems can res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'ayang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyud das
118b2('bum): tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phyem
118b3('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/

118b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag
118b6('bum): bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag ma'i lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi
118b7('bum): phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ 
118b8('bum): phu dud du babagyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can
119a1('bum): rerjes kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po tshe lnga bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgya dpag chad byed
119a2('bum): ba sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang lha rdzas kyi spos dang
119a3('bum): lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim
119a4('bum): gror bgyis bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na
119a5('bum): sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kya de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten
119a6('bum): 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyis me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos
119a7('bum): dang lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
119a8('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems
119b1('bum): can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag
119b2('bum): tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / 
119b3('bum): lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
119b4('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis pa dang mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
119b5('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig ma tshos pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i
119b6('bum): slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi
119b7('bum): me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal
119b8('bum): mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi bdan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig
120a1('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byem snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can ris kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
120a2('bum): nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i
120a3('bum): lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdus
120a4('bum): dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan/ dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis// phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par
120a5('bum): bgyis pa dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed kyi ga mchis pa de dag las sems can re ras kyang de bzhin gshe/ 
120a6('bum): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la
120a7('bum): bskal pa 'am/ de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma
120a8('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur bster bgyis/ phudung du/ 
120b1('bum): bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs/ de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
120b2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka mang ngo // brgya byin gyis gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing
120b3('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bapa' dang / gdugs dang / 
120b4('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim dgror bgyis/ bkur bstir bgyis// phu dud du bgyis mchod par bgyis na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phe'o// de ci'i
120b5('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam
120b6('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
120b7('bum): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / 
120b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
121a1('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi
121a2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
121a3('bum): dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar
121a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 
121a5('bum): lam bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
121a6('bum): dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
121a7('bum): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so// de ni sangs
121a8('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa ste/ de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
121b1('bum): kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin to// phyin par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu dgu pa'o// 
121b2('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du
121b3('bum): 'phel lo// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
121b4('bum): cing / gong du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs
121b5('bum): kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bsod nams ni tshad med grangs
121b6('bum): med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med dpag tu med par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
121b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
121b8('bum): pa las byung ba ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 
122a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ nang stong / 
122a2('bum): pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung / 
122a3('bum): pa ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ chen po stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 
122a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'dus byas stong po nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bani 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi
122a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba/ ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi
122a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ chos tham
122a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// 
122a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
122b1('bum): las byung ba ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
122b2('bum): las byung ba ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ dbang po
122b3('bum): rnams// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni// stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnamaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
122b4('bum): byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i bden dpa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
122b5('bum): byung ba ni/ bsam gtan rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa las byung ba ni/ tshad med pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ gzugs
122b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
122b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin las
122b8('bum): byung ba ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// 
123a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams so// shes
123a2('bum): ma kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byams pa chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung
123a3('bum): ba ni/ snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gsheg
123a4('bum): pa'i spyan lnga'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung dang ni/ sems can yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgya ngas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi
123a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni thams cad shes tra~M nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
123a6('bum): phyin pa las byung ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ 
123a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ theg pa chen po'o// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
123a8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub po// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris ste/ glags bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
123b1('bum): klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
123b2('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams
123b3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba lnga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi tshe dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag
123b4('bum): stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
123b5('bum): phyin pa 'di ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dri na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon mchog
123b6('bum): nub par mi 'gyur ro// de srid du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi rnams 'jig
123b7('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin
123b8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
124a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
124a2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
124a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// den dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong
124a4('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' la ngas 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// thog
124a5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
124a6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
124a7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
124a8('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi
124b1('bum): rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten
124b2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan
124b3('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar
124b4('bum): ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis ga/ nas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung ba/ 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
124b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du
124b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du
124b7('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar
124b8('bum): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
125a1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
125a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ras
125a3('bum): kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gyi lha
125a4('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
125a5('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'o// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
125a6('bum): par 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
125a7('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung
125a8('bum): dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams
125b1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
125b2('bum): du'abyung bar 'gyur ro// mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du
125b3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
125b4('bum): par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs
125b5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'a byung ba yod do// bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye
125b6('bum): shes yod do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod do// sems can yongs su smin pa yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
125b7('bum): rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / 
125b8('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 
126a1('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge ba'i lha rnams dang / chung dge'i lha rnams dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
126a2('bum): dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / chung che'i lha rnams dang / tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi che ba'i lha rnams dang / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams
126a3('bum): dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar
126a4('bum): bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
126a5('bum): kun chub par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / 
126a6('bum): bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yod la byas pas ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun
126a7('bum): chad par mi 'gyur ro// grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad la grogs po dag chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad te/ grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
126a8('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
126b1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
126b2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong
126b3('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig
126b4('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa de nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
126b5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / 
126b6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo
126b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
126b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams
127a1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
127a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
127a3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
127a4('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar dpa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang da smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
127a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
127a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
127a7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung
127a8('bum): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig
127b1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
127b2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
127b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ de ci'i
127b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / thab mo bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang tsham bsngal
127b5('bum): lo snyam na/ de'i tshe ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis sems la kha ton gyis shig/ dang / tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang / des lha
127b6('bum): ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa de dag smos shing rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/ nam bdag cag ngan
127b7('bum): song du skye bar mthong na yang / ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang / de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
127b8('bum): ba dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni/ de ltar don dang ldan
128a1('bum): pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar
128a2('bum): gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
128a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
128a4('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji
128a5('bum): snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di// nyid la bslabs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
128a6('bum): 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe
128a7('bum): skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i
128a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi
128b1('bum): chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so// brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// 
128b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam
128b3('bum): pa'i rig sngagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o// 
128b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de ba bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// ko'u shi
128b5('bum): ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngag so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
128b6('bum): rig sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rig sngags
128b7('bum): 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
128b8('bum): rgyas de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 
129a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten
129a2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rig sngags 'di yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na/ 
129a3('bum): yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na 'od yad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes
129a4('bum): pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin sbyin pa'i pha rol tu daphyin pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i
129a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'gru/ sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin
129a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// 
129a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// 
129a8('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dor ba med
129b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod
129b2('bum): pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
129b3('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na
129b4('bum): yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin// da stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags
129b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin
129b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par
129b7('bum): shes pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa
129b8('bum): yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa
130a1('bum): yin sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na song ba yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na song ba yin/ de bzhin
130a2('bum): nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi gnas nyid
130a3('bum): 'jig rtenan yod pa yin/ chos skyon med pa nyid 'jig rtenan yod pa yim mig lnga 'jig rtenan yong ba yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba
130a4('bum): 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong bas 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra bcom dpa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub
130a5('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad pakhyen
130a6('bum): pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba/ bam po brgya nyer gsum pa/ ko'u shi ka
130a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshad med pa pa ni 'jig rten
130a8('bum): ni gdags su yod pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rtenan gdag su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
130b1('bum): pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi
130b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdugs su yod pa yin// 
130b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdugs su yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa
130b4('bum): nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa de nyid 'jig rten na gdugs su yod pa yin// don dam dpa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin
130b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa/ yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na
130b6('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa
130b7('bum): nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mi dmigs pa
130b8('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i
131a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten
131a2('bum): na gangag su yod pa yin// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na gangag su yod pa
131a3('bum): yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na
131a4('bum): gdag su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na dag dag su yod pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gangadag su yod pa yin/ 
131a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa da smon pa med pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdag
131a6('bum): su song ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yong ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags
131a7('bum): su yod pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdugs su
131a8('bum): yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jin
131b1('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba
131b2('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin// rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na
131b3('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil
131b4('bum): 'khor yod na/ rtsi dang rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad gdag su yod do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sem sa dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ dge ba'i spyod pa
131b5('bum): dang / yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang // / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med/ pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 
131b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas
131b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i
131b8('bum): rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do// slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang / skar ma thams cad kyang gdag su yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
132a1('bum): pas dag par rdzogs pa'is sa rnas kyang 'jig rtenan med par 'gyuraro// gang gi kyis sa rgyas bcom ldan sa rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba 'i nas byung chum sems dpa
132a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos spyon to// deci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ nyan thos kyi thegs
132a3('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po rnams ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thobs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
132a4('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /  bdod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa dang / brtson pa dbyas kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan
132a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba dang / shes ra kyi tu phyin pa la spyong pa dang / na stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / khyi stong pa nyid la stong ba dang / byin stong pa nyid la spyod bar/ 
132a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
132a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'ogs dang sa ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la skyed pa dang / ches thams
132a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbed pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stongs
132b1('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
132b2('bum): la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 
132b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / 
132b4('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas/ dpa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam dpar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
132b5('bum): smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
132b6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
132b7('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par
132b8('bum): byed pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yong su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub
133a1('bum): sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjesu thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
133a2('bum): phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
133a3('bum): chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa
133a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du
133a5('bum): yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gako'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes
133a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par dug gis
133a7('bum): dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mtshon gyis dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mes dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ba nas nad brgya rtsa gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par mi
133a8('bum): 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blon po nas gnod par bya bar zhig byung ba las/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha don byed cing / rgyal po'i phri drang du song nade
133b1('bum): la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags mi rnyed de/ rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems so// 
133b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang mthus de ltar sems so// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed
133b3('bum): cing rgyal po'i phro brang du song na de la rgyal po'i bu 'am rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang / gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
133b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig ngas kyi bu me de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag/ snying rje'i sems dang dga' ba'i sems
133b5('bum): dang / btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar bzhag pa'i phyir te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
133b6('bum): klogs pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/ tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur na/ 
133b7('bum): na/ 'di lta ste/ nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 
133b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
134a1('bum): kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
134a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
134a3('bum): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
134a4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par
134a5('bum): nam yang sems can dmyal bar mi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye 'o// de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du mi 'gyur
134a6('bum): nam yang dbul po'i rigs su mi skye/ smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam sme sha can gyi rigs sam/ mgar ba 'am/ phyag dar pa 'am/ shan pa 'am/ phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/ 
134a7('bum): dmangs rigs su mi skye ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
134a8('bum): bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu brdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'dod na sangs// 
134b1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsdu ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bku pa dang / chos nyan pa'i phying/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de sangs rgyas / 
134b2('bum): nga nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// ko ru shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
134b3('bum): bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun su ma tshogs par 'dod pas shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yi sa bya/ 
134b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bya das te/ de dag ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog ngas pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bang du
134b5('bum): tshe 'do'i yon tan dang che rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang wa~M na par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba las le'u
134b6('bum): bu'o// / de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba grags lta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam
134b7('bum): du sems par gyur te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba brgya po glags lta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong na de la bdag gis ci nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
134b8('bum): byin pa brjod pas/ mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong nas bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin / 
135a1('bum): ba 'di las ji snyed cig gzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji snyed cig/ 
135a2('bum): bzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do// de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ lam de nyid dang sgo
135a3('bum): de nyid nas phyir dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas
135a4('bum): phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na/ de ci'i rgyu ci zhig snyam pa dang / de nas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems
135a5('bum): kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa sha ra dwa ti'i/ bu de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
135a6('bum): pa yang dag par bsam pas/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid
135a7('bum): nas phyir dong ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam lnga yang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / 
135a8('bum): kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa glags lta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni
135b1('bum): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdu dang bcas batshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i che/ zhe sdang ba'i
135b2('bum): sems sam/ glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro bar ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir nen/ shar dwa ti'i bu ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din
135b3('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs
135b4('bum): lha nye pan dang / tshangs ba kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen da / snang ba dang / chung sdang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / 
135b5('bum): dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che bad / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / migadung bdang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang
135b6('bum): 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
135b7('bum): 'di yongs su gzung // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
135b8('bum): khams gang ga'i byem snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
136a1('bum): bo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
136a2('bum): kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
136a3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / 
136a4('bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang
136a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab/ kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// nub phyogs kyi
136a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
136a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de
136a8('bum): dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// byang phyogs kyi
136b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
136b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji
136b3('bum): snyeskad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha
136b4('bum): stag go/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi kham des gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed
136b5('bum): cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
136b6('bum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
136b7('bum): 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
136b8('bum): / ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
137a1('bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / rnamakha' lding dang / mingam ci nga / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa
137a2('bum): yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung / 
137a3('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / 
137a4('bum): lha dang / klung dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
137a5('bum): kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// nub
137a6('bum): byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
137a7('bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte
137a8('bum): 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
137b1('bum): pa las byung ba sha stag go// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed/ 
137b2('bum): cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
137b3('bum): dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes
137b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// steng gi phyog/ das kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/ 
137b5('bum): pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
137b6('bum): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag
137b7('bum): thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
137b8('bum): rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa/ 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las 'dir ni gdon mi za bar/ byang chub sems dpa'
138a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bar chad
138a2('bum): bya'o snyam nas bdud sdig to can gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di
138a3('bum): snyam du sems par gyur to// kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la bdud sdig to can gyi dpung
138a4('bum): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni rgyal po da'abi 'bis ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par/ bkod pas kyang de tsam mi phod/ rgyal po sde rab 'pham
138a5('bum): byed dang / shAkya rnams dang / li tsa byi rnams kyi dbu nga gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de/ tsam mi phod de/ bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po
138a6('bum): nas bcom ldan 'das la yang glags lta zhing glags tshol/ sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la yang gtse ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ 
138a7('bum): yang dag par bsam par bya'o// dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsams te/ dran pas gsal bar brjod
138a8('bum): ba dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can de dag lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir log go/
