163b7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 
163b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mthu
164a1('bum): galas 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'drogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dor bamed pa stong pa nyid sdom pa
164a2('bum): 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
164a3('bum): sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
164a4('bum): sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye dpar bzhag pa bsgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag
164a5('bum): par spong ba sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ dbang po lnga sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ stobs lnga sgom
164a6('bum): pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags
164a7('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin// gzugs
164a8('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa
164b1('bum): mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes pa sgom pa
164b2('bum): mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgro sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu skyob pa mi
164b3('bum): 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen po sbom po me 'phrog
164b4('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcoM brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgom pa mi 'phrogs par
164b5('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba sgo/ ma pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin// 
164b6('bum): gzhan gyis phyir brgal ba ji snyed 'byung ba la yang chos dang mthun par lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
164b7('bum): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar
164b8('bum): byed pa dang / bris shing de la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang kagadugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs/ 
165a1('bum): kyis ma grong byed pa dang / bzung bstir byed pa dang / phudu du byed pa dang / mchong bar byed pa das che 'di'i yon tan gang pos su ldan par rgya ma/ 
165a2('bum): kyi rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyag// bam po brgyanar ldog/ kaudu shi ka gzhan song rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
165a3('bum): 'ad dris shing / glegs pam du byas te/ bachang ba de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang da
165a4('bum): bar zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshem dang /  dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi
165a5('bum): lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dag dang / tshad med dge/ 
165a6('bum): ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang dang dong zhing / shes rab kyi
165a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di daklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so// gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang / mi gdus
165a8('bum): ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun mul bya ba dang / phyag bya ba
165b1('bum): dang gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sem so// ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag/ 
165b2('bum): par zhugs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs
165b3('bum): pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dag dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dag rgyas dang / 
165b4('bum): che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i
165b5('bum): ris mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
165b6('bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po dag kyang der dong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / 
165b7('bum): kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so// ko'u shi ka de la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 
165b8('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris
166a1('bum): kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nya pan dang // tshangs bkun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad meng snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / rlung dge dang / tshad/ 
166a2('bum): med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba'i
166a3('bum): lha dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / da ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / 
166a4('bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklags pa dang / gzungs pa dang // kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i
166a5('bum): phyir lhags pa de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces/ sems bskyed par bya ste/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / 
166a6('bum): kun chub par bya ba dang / mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te/ gdud pa byas nas phyir 'dong ngo // ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal
166a7('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nya phan dang // tshangs pa kun
166a8('bum): 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang che ba dang // chung che dang / tshad med cheg
166b1('bum): dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu dag dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
166b2('bum): rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / 
166b3('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / 
166b4('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / da'abras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha
166b5('bum): dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / bskyang ba byed de/ ko'u shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma
166b6('bum): gtogs par glags lta ba rnams kyis kyang / glags med de/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gang bla na med
166b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang / 
166b8('bum): bskyab pa dang / bskyang ba bya ba'i don du 'dong bar sems ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
167a1('bum): tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don
167a2('bum): du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag
167a3('bum): ba dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phudud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
167a4('bum): 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rna/ mas 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mtshe ma'i lha rnams da'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'ongs
167a5('bum): so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'ong so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ong so zhes
167a6('bum): bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 
167a7('bum): 'dir snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung snang gi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongaso zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir kun snang dang ba'i lha
167a8('bum): rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir chung dga'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi
167b1('bum): ba dang / 'di dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir rlung che'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so
167b2('bum): zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'ong sa zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mi che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'ongs zhes bgyi ba dang / 'di bzhin
167b3('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang / 'dir 'og min gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan
167b4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa 'di gang du bzhag par snang ba chen po byung bar ri gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/ rigs kyi bu
167b5('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni lha mthu chen po mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba/ gzi brjid che ba dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / bcang ba dang / 
167b6('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / gdud pa bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ lhag so zhes bya bar nges par khong du chud par bya'o// 
167b7('bum): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang / ldan na de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des lha de dag kyang nye bar 'ongs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bklag pa dang / 
167b8('bum): gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byas nas/ shin tu dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur ro// gnas de ni lha mthu chung ngu
168a1('bum): / ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag kyang l+h+wamathu chen po mthu nan pa de dag gi gzhi brji dang / dpal dang / dril mi brjod pa'i phying gnas de nas gung du 'dong bar sems so// dzaH ji ltar l+h+wam pa
168a2('bum): bo mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dbang che ba de dag nye bar 'ongs par sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i gnas kyi 'khor kun tu yang gtsang
168a3('bum): sgra med pa'i spyod pa mi rgyu bar byas te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i 'khor gyis yang spos chu'i chag chag gis gdab bo// 
168a4('bum): me tog dang spos kyis gtor ro// bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod gzhag go/ dar gyi lnga ldi dang gos kyi bla re bro'o// sa'i phyo gas rnam pa du mas brgyan par bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu
168a5('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang / lus yang ba dang / lus gsal ba yang nyam su myong bar
168a6('bum): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang / sems yang ba dang / sems gsal ba yang nyamasu myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas nub mo nyal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
168a7('bum): la bsam pas mos par byas na/ sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// des mthong na yang de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
168a8('bum): gnyis mnga' ba dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kun tu brgyan pa/ sku gser gyi mdog tu bzhugs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du
168b1('bum): bdar ba chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
168b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
168b3('bum): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
168b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong dpa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
168b5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar ba zhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang
168b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsan
168b7('bum): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar
168b8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
169a1('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos bstan pa
169a2('bum): yang tho bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i
169a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam
169a4('bum): par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyuraro// 
169a5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur// phyi nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'a gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba
169a6('bum): yang thos par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
169a7('bum): de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang
169a8('bum): thos par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pastod pa nyid don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa
169b1('bum): nyid ni'i don rnam par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// 
169b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par bya ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par
169b3('bum): 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi
169b4('bum): po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phru dal gyi rkang pa bzhi po dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos
169b5('bum): 'gyur ro// stobs lnga po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam ya/ 
169b6('bum): lag brgyad pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang
169b7('bum): thos par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// 
169b8('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar
170a1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa de dag gi don dam par bye ba yang thos par 'gyuraro// mngo par shes pa de dag gdod rnam par bye ba yang thos par 'gyur
170a2('bum): ro/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgod dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang / 
170a3('bum): thos par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// snying
170a4('bum): rje chen po de'i don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gi don rnamad par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi shing yang
170a5('bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yang mthong bar 'gyu ra ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
170a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos
170a7('bum): yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o// sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di
170a8('bum): ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o// bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o zhes zer ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos
170b1('bum): par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams chege mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas chege mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems
170b2('bum): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// lho phyogs
170b3('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ga
170b4('bum): mo zhig bzhugs ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag/ khrig brgya stong mang po 'di skad cig dang / nyan thos bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du
170b5('bum): byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang / kho'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshig
170b6('bum): mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos
170b7('bum): bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang mo'i sgra thos
170b8('bum): par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
171a1('bum): khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bsnod cang mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// byang shar kyi
171a2('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
171a3('bum): che ge mo zhag bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to
171a4('bum): zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar lho'i phyogs mtsham ngas kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos pa ra 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams ches po zhig na ni/ de bzhin
171a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba/ 
171a6('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis skor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos
171a7('bum): par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye
171a8('bum): ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// nub byang gi phyogs
171b1('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che/ 
171b2('bum): mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes
171b3('bum): bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams cheg mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
171b4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dri snyed cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di
171b5('bum): snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to// zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// steng gi phyogs/ kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par
171b6('bum): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhag na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
171b7('bum): khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi sangs
171b8('bum): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang / 
172a1('bum): / po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /

172a3('bum): bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong
172a4('bum): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kya dang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos da dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /

172a6('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig
172a7('bum): brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
172a8('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang phyogs/ 
172b1('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ bye ga khrag khrig pa
172b2('bum): stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
172b3('bum): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phudud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang shar gyi phyogs
172b4('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las
172b5('bum): byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos
172b6('bum): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du
172b7('bum): bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
172b8('bum): gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng
173a1('bum): ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim grong bya ba dang
173a2('bum): bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong
173a3('bum): bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag

173a5('bum): tshegs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ra ro// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba

173b1('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag

173b5('bum): khrag brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ba zhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang /

173b7('bum): bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rmi lam bzang po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te// de dag bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar
173b8('bum): 'gyur ro// de'i lus kyang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ lus la yang ba'i nyams yod par 'gyur/ lci ba'i nyams med par 'gyur/ zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur/ 
174a1('bum): gos la chags pa med par 'gyur/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad la chags pa med par 'gyur/ zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/ gos kyi 'du shes chung bar
174a2('bum): 'gyur/ nang rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyi 'du shes kyang chung bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas
174a3('bum): yongs su rlan pa la zas la cher chags pa med pa yin/ zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa
174a4('bum): med par 'gyur ro// zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la mi ma yin pa rnams de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub po// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
174a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dang / 'gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod/ sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 
174a6('bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus lam dang nye bar sgrub po// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa/ 
174a7('bum): dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub po// nub
174a8('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

174b3('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin

174b5('bum): ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /

174b7('bum): / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub po//

175a1('bum): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang /

175a3('bum): pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang snyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod
175a4('bum): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding / dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed ba de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo// ko'u
175a5('bum): ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongasu gzung bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o// gzung
175a6('bum): bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// bklag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar bya'o// ko'u shi ka
175a7('bum): sta rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma gzung ma bklags/ kun chub par ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na yang / rigs kyi bu
175a8('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / 
175b1('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko'u shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
175b2('bum): mo de dag 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang / 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin no// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba
175b3('bum): dang bcang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba byed cing de bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
175b4('bum): dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed na rigs kyi bu
175b5('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
175b6('bum): rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la nam 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/ 
175b7('bum): bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa de dag mya
175b8('bum): ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/ nam 'tshe'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / 
176a1('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / si la snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ budud du byas/ mchod par byas pa yin no// shes rab gyi/ 
176a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gnyis so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam
176a3('bum): bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byung bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang / la las byin na de las gang blang bar bya/ 
176a4('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 'dzam dbu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang la las srul/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
176a5('bum): phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las sprul na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blangabar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de
176a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags mi rton pa yang ma lags/ btsun par mi bgyid pa yang ma lags ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de
176a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gror bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur bstir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ phu dud du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/ mchod pa bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba yang
176a8('bum): ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror
176b1('bum): bgyi ba lags/ bkur bstir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags/ sku gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrubs te/ de'i slad du de bzhin
176b2('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha/ 
176b3('bum): rdzas kyi spros dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / 
176b4('bum): lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshog kyi rim gror bgyid cing // / bkur/ dbastir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
176b5('bum): sku gdung 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba la gas pas na lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du ba ces pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags
176b6('bum): bkur bstir bgyi ba lags/ phu dud du bgyi ba lags/ mchod par bgyi ba lags pas/ bsrung zhing rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyid do// de nas tshe dang
176b7('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du med pa/ gzugs med pa ltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa
176b8('bum): mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na de la khyod ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa thogs pa med pa mtshan nyid
177a1('bum): gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzung bar sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dzin pa dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir na par gnas pa/ 
177a2('bum): ma yin/ 'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/ bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/ bskyang ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'bri ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir
177a3('bum): ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma
177a4('bum): yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i
177a5('bum): skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas/ kyi dbyings nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi kham sa 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar
177a6('bum): bsgrub pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 
177a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin// 
177a8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus
177b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar
177b2('bum): bsgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
177b3('bum): pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 
177b4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul
177b5('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin dbang po rnam sa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar ba/ sgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar bsgrub
177b6('bum): pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 
177b7('bum): tshad med pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
177b8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar
178a1('bum): bsgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams / 
178a2('bum): bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas
178a3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye
178a4('bum): bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yi na/ rang byang chub nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ da lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin
178a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de yizhi// de de bzhin te/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar shes
178a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma
178a7('bum): yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa yin/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye
178a8('bum): bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma
178b1('bum): yin / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan
178b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ byi nang
178b3('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus byas
178b4('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
178b5('bum): pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye b.rabasgrub pa ma yon/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub
178b6('bum): ba ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong
178b7('bum): nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar bsgrub
178b8('bum): pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ stobs rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar
179a1('bum): bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ bsam gtan
179a2('bum): rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 
179a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ 
179a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
179a5('bum): stobs rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs/ pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so yang dgapar rig pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ snying rje chen
179a6('bum): po nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
179a7('bum): nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rang byang chub nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin// lam gyi
179a8('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// 
179b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis shes par bya ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na mi gnyis pa'o// bsam gtan
179b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ brtsod
179b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
179b4('bum): tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ tshul khrims dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mo gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha ro// tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa'i
179b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// de nas bcom lda na 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la lags so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ ko'u shi ka leg so legs so// ded
179b6('bum): bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// 
179b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
179b8('bum): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ 
180a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
180a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// 
180a3('bum): ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes
180a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med // ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi ngan pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su
180a5('bum): 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshwa kyi dbyings dang bsam gtan gyi pha ro// la tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 
180a6('bum): ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir no na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang
180a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyisu byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
180a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyi su 'dod
180b1('bum): bden chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zang do// de ci'i phyir nen/ ke ru shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byang med do// 
180b2('bum): ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i
180b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
180b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyisu byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
180b5('bum): pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
180b6('bum): de bzhin de la gnyis su med de gnyisu byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyi su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyi su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
180b7('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni
180b8('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang / 
181a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyi su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
181a2('bum): pa dang / de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
181a3('bum): ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dgu
181a4('bum): ba'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 8/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nga yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar mdo/ 
181a5('bum): ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyi su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyi su 'dod du zad/ do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
181a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' do la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag/ 
181a7('bum): pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su
181a8('bum): byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod
181b1('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byur med do// ko'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha
181b2('bum): la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u
181b3('bum): shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang
181b4('bum): dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyi su 'dod du
181b5('bum): zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u sha~M ka de ni 'di ltarashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 
181b6('bum): ke'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam
181b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni
181b8('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
182a1('bum): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byang med do// ko'u shika gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zung ngo // 
182a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ke'u shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
182a3('bum): la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
182a4('bum): ba'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// dke'u shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod dpa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis
182a5('bum): 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su
182a6('bum): byar med do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po brgya nyer drug pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
182a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/ 
182a8('bum): de la bslabs pas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs
182b1('bum): bar 'chang tu'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi ni bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i sman la mchis
182b2('bum): par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ der lnga'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim grol mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod par bgyid te/ nam bdag de da ma mchis shing / stan de la ma mchis pa de'i
182b3('bum): yang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing
182b4('bum): phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de babazhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing ba nga chang ba dang / kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya
182b5('bum): cher ston pa der phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
182b6('bum): lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang
182b7('bum): 'di las byung ngo // sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag byas shing gdud pa bgyis nas/ 
182b8('bum): slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga'
183a1('bum): sa la chub sems dang mas da na byang chu ses dpa ba smra / 
183a2('bum): tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur te// rgyur gyur te// rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ cha de gnyis las bdag ni
183a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i/ 
183a4('bum): tshe'ajigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhen/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
183a5('bum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du/ ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
183a6('bum): ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtag ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis
183a7('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
183a8('bum): tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
183b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ 
183b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ 
183b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ 
183b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ 
183b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
183b6('bum): 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
183b7('bum): 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chen po
183b8('bum): stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
184a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ 
184a2('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni spros su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod dum
184a3('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma ma chis/ rtags ma mtshas
184a4('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' las/ 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma
184a5('bum): ma mchis rtags ma mchis / brjod du ma ma chis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom
184a6('bum): ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// 
184a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// 
184a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis
184b1('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan das gi ma ngan nyid stong panyid nimatshan mam ma nges rtags ma mchis brjod dum mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan das rang gi mtshan nid stong ba nyid
184b2('bum): spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong / 
184b3('bum): pa nyid na smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos
184b4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// ma ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags pa ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ 
184b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod dum
184b6('bum): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis
184b7('bum): rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams
184b8('bum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
185a1('bum): rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// 
185a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
185a3('bum): stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi
185a4('bum): yan lag rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan da lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
185a5('bum): 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchi sa rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa!bcom ldan 'das
185a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
185a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan
185a8('bum): 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das tshad
185b1('bum): med pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom
185b2('bum): ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ 
185b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis
185b4('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos sum mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo
185b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med/ pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar
185b6('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ 
185b7('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa
185b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod dum mchis pa ste/ 
186a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags
186a2('bum): ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma
186a3('bum): mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rigs pa
186a4('bum): rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das so// so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// 
186a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// 
186a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
186a7('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa
186a8('bum): nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan ras lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi
186b1('bum): rnam pa rnas pa nyid ni smos sum mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan mam mchigartags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
186b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma
186b3('bum): lags na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod
186b4('bum): du ma mchis pa dang / spos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon dpar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams
186b5('bum): la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi sa
186b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/ smos su ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / 
186b7('bum): rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sa rgyas nas/ 
186b8('bum): sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / smos su ma mchis pa'i chos ston to// bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha
187a1('bum): myed pa dod kya med/ sbrul 'i dus u pa 'dus rten gyis/ mchog dang / phreng ba dang /  dang / byug pa dang / 
187a2('bum): dudu/ na papa dung/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkung bsti dang / bdu dang / mchod pa bgyi bar dzes pa'o// dris shi
187a3('bum): me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dab/ na bza' dang // gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur
187a4('bum): bsti dang / phu dung dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / bklog cing kun chub
187a5('bum): ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bris shing / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug par/ phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
187a6('bum): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ bkur bstir bgyid/ bu drad du bgyid/ mchod par bgyid na/ de ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
187a7('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis por bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa/ 
187a8('bum): ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can
187b1('bum): yongs su smin par bgyi bdag mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 
187b2('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid cing
187b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
187b4('bum): gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang stsal la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang bris te/ stsal na bco ma ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab
187b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
187b6('bum): gdung rnams te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur bstir bgyi ba dang / phu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu
187b7('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dag la rim gror bgyis bkur bstir bgyis// phu dud du bgyis/ mchod pa bgyis na log par ltung ba dang song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te
187b8('bum): lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas
188a1('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris
188a2('bum): mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du na na bcom ldan 'das denani 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyi sum mchis ste/ 
188a3('bum): gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ 
188a4('bum): mdo dang / dbyangs kyis snyad pa dang / lung bstan pa/ dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chad du brjo/ dad pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / 
188a5('bum): skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / 
188a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchiso// bcom
188a7('bum): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul
188a8('bum): rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyi snyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das
188b1('bum): bAdang / skyes pade bas dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs
188b2('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub phyogs kyi
188b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtsham
188b4('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang ngas rgyas dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gsheg/ ngas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 
188b5('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
188b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
188b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / tshigs su gcad pa dang / 
188b8('bum): lung du bstan pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa/ 
189a1('bum): dang / chos gtan la phab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di brdung shing kun chub par bgyis
189a2('bum): te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnamaso// 
189a3('bum): 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis snyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcang ba dang / ched du brjod pa dang
189a4('bum): glang gzhi dang 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs da dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'o// 
189a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
189a6('bum): rgyas de dag la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / 
189a7('bum): bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang mchod pa bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis shing me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
189a8('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dung dang mchod par bgyis pa yang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// de ci
189b1('bum): / drisas rlung ba de ban ga shegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// bcom lda ngas gan sang rigs kyi bu gas sa bu ga
189b2('bum): la pa / sa bdag stegs /  shrI sa rjes su /  da 'i phru
189b3('bum): mtshas pa pa'o// tsam sushes kyis ma da kyi sa k+Sha s+t+wa~M/ sa pan pa / 
189b4('bum): 'di ltar doni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bres shing 'dzin to// 'chang ngo // khrog go// kun chub par bgyid do// rdul bzhin du yidas bgyid do// bris padal yang sa
189b5('bum): tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/ phu dung
189b6('bum): du bgyid mchod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o// bcom ldan
189b7('bum): 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de la me tog
190a1('bum): dang phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil sAn sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / 
190a2('bum): bkur bsti dang phu dung dang / mchod pa bgyid pa des ni gang nas kyang 'jigs pa byung ba'i ngogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes su nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jig
190a3('bum): nas rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la brten nas/ de rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten pas sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas de dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur// 
190a4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la brten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la bya rten pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
