190a5('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrub pas na/ mchod pa mang ngo //  ma ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang
190a6('bum): lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrub par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na bdag gis chad de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar
190a7('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du rten/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// dpe
190a8('bum): las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// 'di las byung ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o// 'di las byung ba ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o// 
190b1('bum): 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad do// 'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ 
190b2('bum): de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob bo// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ grong
190b3('bum): khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun
190b4('bum): chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag du mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa glags lta zhing klags
190b5('bum): tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang / theg pa gsum las thag pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
190b6('bum): ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de ltar/ 
190b7('bum): sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs
190b8('bum): rgyas 'byung ba dang / 'dra bar blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che chen po rini mi dpogs shes bgyi ba mchis ste/ da ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa
191a1('bum): 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po dgang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lagras pa rnams kyis glags mirnyed do// mi ma lags pas zin pa'i
191a2('bum): skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyang nor bu rin po che de bstan na mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so// mkhris pas gdung ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen
191a3('bum): po de btags na/ mkhris pa de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// rlung gis mnar ba'i lus nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ rlung de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bad kan gyis non pa'i
191a4('bum): lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na bad kan dad yang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i bros btab pa/ de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ 'dus
191a5('bum): ba'i bro de yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par mi 'phel lo// nub mon snang bar bgyid do// tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil
191a6('bum): par bgyid do// grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de yang
191a7('bum): ha cang yang mi dro// ha cang yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sprul lam de ma lags pa'i
191a8('bum): sdig pa la sogs pa gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig sbrul gdugs pas zin pa la/ nor bu rin po che chen po da bsta/ 
191b1('bum): na/ des de mthong ma thag tu dug de yang byang bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig
191b2('bum): 'brum bus btab bam/ mig rab rib can du gyur te/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad ci byung ba las/ 
191b3('bum): de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po da btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu 'am/ rab rib 'am/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nang dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ 
191b4('bum): lus kyi nad de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/ gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de chab
191b5('bum): rnyog pa can gyi nang du stsal na/ de'i mod la chab de thams ca/ da kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par/ 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon
191b6('bum): bos dkris te/ chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i/ 
191b7('bum): rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos dmar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du sprul na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen
191b8('bum): po dgos dkar pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po dgos le rgan gyis dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de'i rang
192a1('bum): bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po shel gyis khadog gos kyis kris te chab kyinang du stsal pa/ chab de 'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyuraro// dengs
192a2('bum): dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// cha ba de la rnyog pa mchis pa yang nor bu rin po che chen po des 'dang ste
192a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin
192a4('bum): po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di
192a5('bum): skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam 'on te nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la
192a6('bum): yang yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che chen po gang yod pa
192a7('bum): de dag ni chung zhing lci lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa
192a8('bum): ma yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gner bu rin po che de dag gis ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i grangs sa mcha'am bgrang ba'am dpa' 'am/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de nas yang chu'i
192b1('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gis nang du stsal stsal pa las/ snod de nas phyung yang
192b2('bum): snod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa/ 
192b3('bum): de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis lus sam sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa mi las gyur pa 'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma
192b4('bum): mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po yang zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas daso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig
192b5('bum): bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis
192b6('bum): so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis
192b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom
192b8('bum): ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
193a1('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ 
193a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni ched ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod // bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi sa
193a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshul khrims
193a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das ste ngan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lnga ji skad cig brjod par bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan
193a5('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// btsa ma ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
193a6('bum): bgyis te/ nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan
193a7('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang
193a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
193b1('bum): snod do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
193b2('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshangam/ 
193b3('bum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyis te/ 
193b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong ga
193b5('bum): nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ 'dus/ byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// da ba/ zhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa
193b6('bum): nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
193b7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ mtha' las 'das
193b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa
194a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
194a2('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod du/ bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyis te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
194a3('bum): kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
194a4('bum): bgyis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yon tan nidam mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang dang de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom
194a5('bum): ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ chos thams cad ste/ nga ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
194a6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ rang gi mtshad nyid stong
194a7('bum): pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan/ 
194a8('bum): lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi yon ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi snod ngo // 
194b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
194b2('bum): gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma
194b3('bum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
194b4('bum): brjod par bgyis te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyi/ dang stong pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo
194b5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye b.rabazhag pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi yon tan
194b6('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i yon tan lta ji skad cig
194b7('bum): brjod par bgyis te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan
194b8('bum): 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yon tan ni tshed ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
195a1('bum): dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams kyi snod // bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis
195a2('bum): dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par/ 
195a3('bum): bgyis te/ stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan
195a4('bum): lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag/ 
195a5('bum): rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji skad cig brjod par bgyis te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
195a6('bum): brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa
195a7('bum): rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags
195a8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis// 
195b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ tshad med pa rnams kyis yon
195b2('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshad med pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon
195b3('bum): tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
195b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te
195b5('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
195b6('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis// 
195b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
195b8('bum): dang smon pa med pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam
196a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ mngon par shes/ 
196a2('bum): pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta rdza
196a3('bum): snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
196a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
196a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de nga zhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
196a6('bum): stobs rnams kyi yon tan tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i
196a7('bum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do// 
196a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
196b1('bum): ba'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshangs
196b2('bum): mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par
196b3('bum): bgyis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom
196b4('bum): ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig ba dang bar bgyis te/ thams cad shes pa'i yon te// tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs
196b5('bum): ba'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ lam gyi rnam
196b6('bum): ba shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
196b7('bum): pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams
196b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod de// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin
197a1('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ 
197a2('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon
197a3('bum): tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzhan ma yin de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// 
197a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
197a5('bum): chos nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyed / sa kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// 
197a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ chos kyi gnas
197a7('bum): nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed
197a8('bum): cig brjod par bgyis te/ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do// bcom
197b1('bum): ngas spya sa ga 'a sa yang spyan sa/  ga sa rlungs
197b2('bum): rjo / des sungs pas ma pa rgyas m+b+ha /  ga pa ba / bam byas pa'i tshus kyi ma
197b3('bum): de ga shenas pa sgru du dag kyang bsas kyis ni khyab pa'i dbyas skyed de/ bcom ldan 'das pagachags kyim rnams stong ba na rmongs pa pam
197b4('bum): cang smras pa'i son tan ji snyed cig brjod par bgyis te/ dbag chags kyi mtsham sa sbrer ba'i nyin mongs pa thams dud sbyangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad mi mchis so// 
197b5('bum): sa sa smra sa snang ba napa seM pa sa sa thams sa ga
197b6('bum): la gnas pa'i yon tan nga sring dag brjod par bstis te/ drug tu bad snyom sa la gangs pa'i yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gadrung de dag kyang rtag tu btung snyoms
197b7('bum): la gnas pa'i rjod do// bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i rjes nyid kyi yon tan saji skad cig brjod par bgyis te/ mi mnyam pa'i chom nid kyi man tan ni tshang ma mchis so// 
197b8('bum): de bzhi ga shegs pa'i sdug du dag pa mamanyam pa'i ngo ma nyid kyi snong ngo // debs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mu ga nga de dag ni mchod pa mang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
198a1('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mang 'o// bcom ldan
198a2('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
198a3('bum): de dag ni mchod pa mngango'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshes pa'i sdu gdu de dag no mchod/ 
198a4('bum): ba mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin
198a5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dad/ ga ni pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba dang / bsnan pa ma mchis
198a6('bum): ba'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang / 
198a7('bum): 'gro ba dang gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha
198a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyi snod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs po mya ngan las 'das
198b1('bum): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ga dung de dag ni mchod pa mngango'o// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byung bur yongs su bltam pa lta/ 
198b2('bum): zhog gi bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byung bur bltam pa dang shes rab kyi/ 
198b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
198b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin ga/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sad ngas rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te/ mchod pa mnga'o// 
198b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgos bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du ngag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
198b6('bum): 'amarigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur bstir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i
198b7('bum): rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho'i ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthong ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
198b8('bum): kyi lha 'am sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang / lha'i phun sum
199a1('bum): tshogs pa dang / bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni da
199a2('bum): tsam du bas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing bcangs pa dang bklags shing kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/ ting nge 'dzin gyis pha rol tu
199a3('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bas gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod
199a4('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs para'agyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
199a5('bum): 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs para'agyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 
199a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong
199a7('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang / 
199a8('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// chos thams cad
199b1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa ste/ 
199b2('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
199b3('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par
199b4('bum): 'gyur ro// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// 
199b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bde ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs
199b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// / 
199b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin
199b8('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi
200a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos
200a2('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de chad du bsams te/ lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor
200a3('bum): los bsgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ 
200a4('bum): tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso bo'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas
200a5('bum): kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes
200a6('bum): pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na/ bdag ni de bzhin
200a7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ glo ba mchis pa yang ma mchis/ mchod par mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags te/ 
200a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tham/ 
200b1('bum): cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnamal yang rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dung
200b2('bum): dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs ma mchis pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
200b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas
200b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bzung bar bgyi/ dbacang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par
200b5('bum): bstan par bgyi tshul bzhin du yid la bgyiste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'ji garten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs
200b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des chos nyid du sangs rgyas
200b7('bum): rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
200b8('bum): mthong bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la rgya cher/ 
201a1('bum): yang dag par bstan par bgyi chos nyid tshul bzhin du yang ying la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag na chos nyid de gnyis gang shin/ 'dus byas chos
201a2('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas rnams chos kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong / 
201a3('bum): pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus byas
201a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye / des dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang
201a5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang bzhin stong/ pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 
201a6('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dran pa nye
201a7('bum): bar bzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang / stobs lnga'i ye shes dang
201a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang / 
201b1('bum): tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug da bzhi'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
201b2('bum): dgu'i ye shes dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
201b3('bum): kyi ye shes dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ya
201b4('bum): shes dang / snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang / dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye
201b5('bum): shes dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten las
201b6('bum): 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// de la 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma
201b7('bum): mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las bzhin du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par
201b8('bum): byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ 
202a1('bum): chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di ni 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
202a2('bum): ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202a3('bum): phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
202a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dgakyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
202a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//  ltar byung ba'i phyog bcu'i 'jig rten rgya/ khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
202a6('bum): ji skad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
202a7('bum): sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i de bzhin
202a8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
202b1('bum): sas r+b+bas rnams kyi nyan pas gang srid cigasod pa de dag gis kyang zhes rab kyi rol phyin pa 'di la zhen tu rgyud tu zhugs pa'i 'brus bu thob po 'thob pa/ thob par 'gyur/ 
202b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob po 'thob pa
202b3('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi
202b4('bum): khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten to// rang byang
202b5('bum): chub thob po 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// 'i phyir zhen 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa/ 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ 
202b6('bum): de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par
202b7('bum): byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang / bsnun pa med pa'i tshul dang / 
202b8('bum): blang ba med pa'i tshul dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203a1('bum): byin pa ni nga du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin pa chom ma yin/ bang du 'dug pa
203a2('bum): ma yin// gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa
203a3('bum): ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ke'u shi ka/ 
203a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye/ bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub
203a5('bum): pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar ba sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203a6('bum): phyin pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203a7('bum): phyin pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// 
203a8('bum): rim po brgya nyer bdun pa// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
203b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du gdags
203b2('bum): par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// srog du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmigs pa ma ma
203b3('bum): so// gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// gang zag du dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// shed bdag/ 
203b4('bum): tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// byed pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchiso// / shes pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthong ba pa
203b5('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du/ 
203b6('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// snar dmigs pa ma mchis// lcang
203b7('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus su dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// sgrar dmigs pa ma mchis so// drir dmigs
203b8('bum): pa ma mchis so// ror dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnab
204a1('bum): rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
204a2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
204a3('bum): par dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchiso// / 
204a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig/ dgi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa dam mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
204a5('bum): tsher bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis
204a6('bum): so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i kham su dmigs pa ma
204a7('bum): mchis so// chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// me'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams su
204a8('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par
204b1('bum): shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so// ming dang gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tsher
204b2('bum): bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dmigs pa ma mchis so// len par dmigs pa ma mchis so// srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
204b3('bum): rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
204b4('bum): par dmigs pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha
204b5('bum): rol tu phyin par dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis// 
204b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du
204b7('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
204b8('bum): nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa
205a1('bum): ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po
205a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
205a3('bum): rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams su dmigs pa ma
205a4('bum): mchis so// stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs
205a5('bum): ba ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmig sa pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams su da migs pa ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams su dmigs
205a6('bum): pa ma mchis so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
205a7('bum): 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams su
205a8('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnamasu dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnamasu dmigs pa ma
205b1('bum): mchis so// mi 'jigs pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
205b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// 
205b3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du
205b4('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub tu dmigs pa mi mchis so// sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ 
205b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul du/ nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la
205b6('bum): dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
205b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyad pas/ des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos
205b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos lta yang ci smos brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi de ma lags
206a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ koru shika byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu
206a2('bum): phyin pa drug po kun la yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs gtong ba yang mi dmigs len pa yang mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyang
206a3('bum): mi dmigs tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs tshul khrims ngan pa yang mi dmigs so// bzod pa yang mi dmigs bzod pa dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs
206a4('bum): gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yang mid dmigs/ le lo yang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan
206a5('bum): yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa yang mi dmig sa 'khrug pa yang mi dmigs so// shes rab kyang mi dmigs shes rab dang ldan pa yang mi
206a6('bum): dmigs shes rab 'chal pa yang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
206a7('bum): 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs
206a8('bum): pa'i tshul dang / sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs
206b1('bum): ba'i tshul dang / sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig/ 
206b2('bum): gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi
206b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmig pa'i tshul dang / 
206b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'du das te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus tu reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te
206b5('bum): reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
206b6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi
206b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i
206b8('bum): khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams mi/ 
207a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i/ 
207a2('bum): tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang reg po mi dmigs pa'i tshul
207a3('bum): dang tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs
207a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
207a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
207a6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa
207a7('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
207a8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
207b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad
207b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
207b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi mi
207b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs dpa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
207b5('bum): stobs lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang byang chub kyi ya na lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phag sa pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
207b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
207b7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam
207b8('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting
208a1('bum): 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi
208a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
208a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
208a4('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi
208a5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub
208a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub
208a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems
208a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
208b1('bum): dpa' chen po 'artson 'grus bcom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
208b2('bum): chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bye ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nga ni
208b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing
208b4('bum): rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can dbyibs sna tshogs can chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang de dag gi
208b5('bum): grib ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag mi dmigs te/ gnadun grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar bad do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab
208b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngos pa rnams la yang khyad par ma bye brag mi dmigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa bcom
208b7('bum): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
208b8('bum): phyin pa ni/ yon tan tshad ma mchims pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa/ 
209a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am / rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209a2('bum): phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis ste bcangs pa dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
209a3('bum): dang ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis bkur bstir bgyis/ phud dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin shes rab kyi
209a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan
209a5('bum): stsal na de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams ches 'phel bar/ 'gyurabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la bris khyod kyis ji
209a6('bum): lhar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ ko'u shi ka nga snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang phreng ba dang / 
209a7('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas bkur bstir byas
209a8('bum): budud du byas mchod par byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byen te/ bgo ba shar byas pa
209b1('bum): bye ma dang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam de drangs te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa
209b2('bum): dang na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ 
209b3('bum): de dag las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te
209b4('bum): de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gsheg das pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
209b5('bum): bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil spyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis bkur bstir bgyis/ bu dung du bgyis/ mchod
209b6('bum): par bgyis pas gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches 'phel lo// bcom ldan
209b7('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i sku ba shig/ 
209b8('bum): sems can gyi ris na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
210a1('bum): du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa
210a2('bum): bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thugs par sdug bsngal mthar phyin par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// 
210a3('bum): de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang
210a4('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / nga rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyi rim gror byas bkur bstir byas/ phu dud du byas
210a5('bum): mchod par byas pa gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na ri gas kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches 'phel
210a6('bum): bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shrI rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste/ bshad cing bstan pa dang / 
210a7('bum): brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te
210a8('bum): sbyin pa yin par bsam mo// bla ma'i gnas mkhas batshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsamamo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shika 'di la shes rab kyi pha yos phyin
210b1('bum): pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
210b2('bum): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / 
210b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs
210b4('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de ra drug kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
210b5('bum): phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o// mngon par
210b6('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po// 
210b7('bum): 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa/ 
210b8('bum): nyid thob po 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
211a1('bum): sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang chu bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
211a2('bum): rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
211a3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am
211a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
211a5('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gro bya ba 'dod pa dang / bkur bstir bya bar 'dod pa dang
211a6('bum): phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
211a7('bum): na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// ko'u shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang
211a8('bum): dag par mthong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud
211b1('bum): dang mchod par byas te/ brten cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/ ko'u shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdu dang bcas pa tshang ba dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu
211b2('bum): dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de lta yin no bdag
211b3('bum): gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas te/ brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o/ 
211b4('bum): snyam du bsam mo// ko'u shi ka chos de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ dko'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
211b5('bum): 'di la rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed de/ de ltar rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byas
211b6('bum): shing rnam par spyod na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
211b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna
211b8('bum): tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang
212a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa
212a2('bum): dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba
212a3('bum): lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ 
212a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung
212a5('bum): ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo 'am nyan thos
212a6('bum): kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 
212a7('bum): phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// 
212a8('bum): de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon
212b1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob po 'thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang
212b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gsum mo// 
212b3('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i
212b4('bum): las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u sha~M ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / nga'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram
212b5('bum): gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar ga shegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis
212b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa 'am/ bri ba 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab
212b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo slob cing / yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur
212b8('bum): ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang
213a1('bum): thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
213a2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag
213a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher
213a4('bum): bstan to// kai'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye dbar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / 
213a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang / ston/ sa lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
213a6('bum): papa'i bden pa bzhi dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 
213a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
213a8('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
213b1('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
213b2('bum): dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos te/ de dag ni shes rab
213b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
213b4('bum): sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// / ko'u shi ka sems can gcig cig rgyun tu zhugs
213b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod
213b6('bum): pas ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na ko'u shi ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang
213b7('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / 
213b8('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir ring ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra btso nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos
214a1('bum): ga 'as N+DI sa sa sarmAn+na r+dz+dzags pa'i 'bras gyus pa nga / lan tshig kyi yo gyu
214a2('bum): bkod pa dang // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa pas la la zhog gos sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag na/ 'di'i bsod nams
214a3('bum): rjes mang du 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
214a4('bum): sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
214a5('bum): can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ gzhog pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi bcad pa'i don tu zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u
214a6('bum): ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnamaso// ke'u
214a7('bum): shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des na 'di ltar byang chub
214a8('bum): sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye
214b1('bum): dgus me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba
214b2('bum): dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i
214b3('bum): las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 
214b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
214b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba 'am bklag ba 'am kha tog du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na ba sod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
214b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// / 
214b7('bum): 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ 
214b8('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/ 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs
215a1('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
215a2('bum): chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// 
215a3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // 
215a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
215a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi/ stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid de stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 
215a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang
215a7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
215a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
215b1('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams
215b2('bum): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang // rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar
215b3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
215b4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ba/ zhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sa ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa
215b5('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang bta nga snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam
215b6('bum): grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin
215b7('bum): na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod
215b8('bum): bas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
216a1('bum): rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
216a2('bum): yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// 
216a3('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
216a4('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dgo'i lha rnams yod// tshad ming dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi/ delha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i
216a5('bum): lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 2bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// miche ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong
216a6('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
216a7('bum): rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'dus shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims
216a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
216b1('bum): yod do// nga stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid do// phyin stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid song ngo // don ngas pa stong pa nyid song ngo // 'dus byas
216b2('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin
216b3('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
216b4('bum): yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran dpa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// 
216b5('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden
216b6('bum): pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis
216b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin
216b8('bum): rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po rnam
217a1('bum): yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod//
