217a2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong / 
217a3('bum): ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yodado// de bzhin gshegs pa dag
217a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji
217a5('bum): snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba pa/ cu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de/ ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
217a6('bum): de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas
217a7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du
217a8('bum): 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am
217b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro// 
217b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom
217b3('bum): pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
217b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go' 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
217b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rje gas par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa
217b6('bum): med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
217b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / 
217b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 
218a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
218a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag
218a3('bum): pab bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
218a4('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
218a5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa/ dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang // 
218a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs/ 
218a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan
218a8('bum): dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko 'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing // klag pa
218b1('bum): dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha ro/ 
218b2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs
218b3('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// tshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod/ 
218b4('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed/ gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun
218b5('bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnamasayod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod// kun snang
218b6('bum): dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
218b7('bum): chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mtho
218b8('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
219a1('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
219a2('bum): pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes
219a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa
219a4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
219a5('bum): yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin ste/ nga ba nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa
219a6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// 
219a7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags
219a8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
219b1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang // 
219b2('bum): smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa
219b3('bum): rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// 
219b4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// 
219b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhug/ pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams mo//  do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom
219b6('bum): pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
219b7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji
219b8('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
220a1('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
220a2('bum): bka' stsal ba ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir
220a3('bum): gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ 
220a4('bum): de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'ju gra go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
220a5('bum): bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
220a6('bum): bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob
220a7('bum): par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyuraro// 
220a8('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka/ 
220b1('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
220b2('bum): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
220b3('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong / 
220b4('bum): pa nyid dudadu/ der ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong/ ngo bo nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang dgi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
220b5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang dran pa nye bar ba zhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / 
220b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang
220b7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 
220b8('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / 
221a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa
221a2('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang
221a3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glags bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches
221a4('bum): mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod
221a5('bum): bas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal
221a6('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe mi'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// 
221a7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha
221a8('bum): rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod
221b1('bum): chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che
221b2('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang
221b3('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad
221b4('bum): med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin da pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu// 
221b5('bum): phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol
221b6('bum): tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong
221b7('bum): pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
221b8('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
222a1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// 
222a2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i
222a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
222a4('bum): rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
222a5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes ba rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
222a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
222a7('bum): yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// 
222a8('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams
222b1('bum): yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
222b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po brgya nyer brgyad pa/ 
222b3('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba
222b4('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na ko'u shi ka de dzi snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa
222b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa ma ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
222b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
222b7('bum): ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
222b8('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyuraro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
223a1('bum): bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 
223a2('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
223a3('bum): rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
223a4('bum): so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzo gus par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa ri'u chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha
223a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da/ nga bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
223a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
223a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
223a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
223b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
223b2('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
223b3('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 
223b4('bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
223b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms/ 
223b6('bum): chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
223b7('bum): glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi
223b8('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
224a1('bum): yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// tshe ma'i lha
224a2('bum): rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye
224a3('bum): phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// 
224a4('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang da ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge
224a5('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha/ rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
224a6('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
224a7('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams
224a8('bum): yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
224b1('bum): phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi
224b2('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus
224b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams
224b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// 8mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med
224b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag/ ba rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbu po rnams yod// 
224b6('bum): stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams
224b7('bum): yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
224b8('bum): pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs
225a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen
225a2('bum): po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// 
225a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir/ 
225a4('bum): 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
225a5('bum): rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lnga
225a6('bum): zhog gi ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ 
225a7('bum): ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa
225a8('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam la bri ba dang
225b1('bum): thug pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phying gzhan la byinan/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel ste// daci'i phyir zhen// ko ru shika de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med/ 
225b2('bum): pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
225b3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi
225b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 2 thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi
225b5('bum): theg pa pa rnams kyi rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 2 thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa
225b6('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs
225b7('bum): papor 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
225b8('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang
226a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas/ 
226a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / 
226a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo/ 
226a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba de zhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
226a5('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya da pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
226a6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
226a7('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
226a8('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang
226b1('bum): snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
226b2('bum): partsigs pam du sa shi / dartag pa dang / zib dang / rten du bya ba'i phyi gzhan la sbyin/ de bas 'di'i bseMd nams chis mang du 'bal pa shes par bya'o// 
226b3('bum): zhen/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che/ 
226b4('bum): zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhan dmas yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// 
226b5('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yo/ da do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha/ 
226b6('bum): rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang
226b7('bum): gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha
226b8('bum): rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
227a1('bum): mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// migadu lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams
227a2('bum): yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes
227a3('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi
227a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa
227a5('bum): nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po/ stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
227a6('bum): yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad
227a7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ 
227a8('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams
227b1('bum): yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med/ 
227b2('bum): pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i
227b3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
227b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yo/ dad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa
227b5('bum): brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'o// ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// 
227b6('bum): rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir
227b7('bum): mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
227b8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa
228a1('bum): de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
228a2('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs
228a3('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phe'o// 
228a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes kyi ba tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgyu cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs
228a5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhu gas par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 
228a6('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lani cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
228a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur
228a8('bum): ro/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' skyon stod par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 
228b1('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang ni
228b2('bum): na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
228b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang
228b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa nga stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
228b5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong
228b6('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / 
228b7('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
228b8('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
229a1('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
229a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa
229a3('bum): gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bkrug pa dang
229a4('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na pa ngas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes pa 'o// ci'i phyir nan/ kai ru shika de ni 'di ska
229a5('bum): shes ra kyi chos phyin pa 'di las chos rnams cad ra bstan// dag slong pas rgyal rigs shing mthong rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs chen
229a6('bum): rnams yod do// khyis bdag gi rigs kyi zhing mtho pa rnams sod // rgyal chen pani sa kyis rnams sod // sum surgya gsum gyi rnarnams pa // ma ma'i rnams pa/ 
229a7('bum): dga'ardzun gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul bang byed kyi lha rnams yong ngo // chos ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnga rte na gyi rnams
229a8('bum): yi do// tshangs 'akun 'khong gyi rnams med /  chen gyi kyirnams song // snang ba'i rnarnams pa // rlung shA ga surnams med do// dang snang ba/ 
229b1('bum): rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
229b2('bum): yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung
229b3('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
229b4('bum): yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnam sa yod de// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
229b5('bum): lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
229b6('bum): pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid/ 
229b7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong
229b8('bum): pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi
230a1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong / 
230a2('bum): pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// 
230a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// 
230a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
230a5('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod/ do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
230a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyun tu zhugs
230a7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// / 
230a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas
230b1('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams song ngo // ko ru shi ka gzhan yang / 
230b2('bum): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
230b3('bum): shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // 
230b4('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pam
230b5('bum): bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan/ la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
230b6('bum): phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa sa rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug
230b7('bum): par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// 
230b8('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
231a1('bum): rnams kyis rang byang chub tho par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par
231a2('bum): zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
231a3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
231a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol rab tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / 
231a5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa'i/ da stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
231a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
231a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
231a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
231b1('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par
231b2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
231b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bani dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang byams pa chen po dang / 
231b4('bum): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyomasachen po dag ste sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos tshad med pag/ zhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des rgya
231b5('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na debs 'di'i
231b6('bum): bsod nams ched mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir na na/ ko ru shi ka do ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod
231b7('bum): pas rgyal rigs che zhing mthi ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen pa ni 'ongs kyi lha rnams
231b8('bum): yod de/ sum surtsa gsum kyi lha rnams yod do// mdze ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lharnams song ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod
232a1('bum): dod tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang
232a2('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad
232a3('bum): med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i rnams yod do// mi
232a4('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha'
232a5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha/ 'ayas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med
232a6('bum): min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de/ 
232a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// 
232a8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog mdapa
232b1('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa
232b2('bum): nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams
232b3('bum): yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags
232b4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// / tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// 
232b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams
232b6('bum): yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod// / 
232b7('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// 
232b8('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba
233a1('bum): rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
233a2('bum): rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po
233a3('bum): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
233a4('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bko/ dra na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ ra rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ 
233a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshe gas pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ba/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
233a6('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
233a7('bum): ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
233a8('bum): skyon mad par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'dras
233b1('bum): bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// 
233b2('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub
233b3('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par
233b4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nga rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
233b5('bum): dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
233b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa
233b7('bum): nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
233b8('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
234a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / 
234a2('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
234a3('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
234a4('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
234a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen/ po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
234a6('bum): chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / 
234a7('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir na na/ kai'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
234a8('bum): phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho
234b1('bum): ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams song ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
234b2('bum): yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs
234b3('bum): chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams
234b4('bum): yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// 
234b5('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha/ rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
234b6('bum): yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
234b7('bum): rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims
234b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa
235a1('bum): yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don
235a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
235a3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
235a4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag
235a5('bum): bar spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yo da do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 
235a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
235a7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / 
235a8('bum): smon pa med pa rnams yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi
235b1('bum): 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// 
235b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams
235b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams
235b4('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
235b5('bum): yod do// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
235b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la
235b7('bum): rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
235b8('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi kA de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag
236a1('bum): dang / bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ 
236a2('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan ste/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur// 
236a3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i
236a4('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyuraro// / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ dathob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi/ 
236a5('bum): rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'a gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par
236a6('bum): gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par
236a7('bum): rdzogs par mtshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
236a8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
236b1('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 
236b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
236b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
236b4('bum): bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 
236b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
236b6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / 
236b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / 
236b8('bum): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi
237a1('bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas/ 
237a2('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod
237a3('bum): bas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho bo rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gis rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi ris kyi lha rnams
237a4('bum): yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yo dad do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul
237a5('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams/ yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi
237a6('bum): lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams
237a7('bum): yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod// che ba'i lha rnams yo// rlung che'i lha rnams yod/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras
237a8('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min
237b1('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 
237b2('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson
237b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa
237b4('bum): nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
237b5('bum): yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//  ga ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong po nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos
237b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po
237b7('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// 
237b8('bum): stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// 
238a1('bum): tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
238a2('bum): 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yod do// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// 
238a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgra rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas
238a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bra ngas bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid
238a5('bum): yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyi da yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
238a6('bum): yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin
238a7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// / 
238a8('bum): ba po rgya nyer dgu pa// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
238b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de
238b2('bum): ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom
238b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i
238b4('bum): phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher
238b5('bum): bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs
238b6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
238b7('bum): thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang
238b8('bum): chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 
239a1('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon
239a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
239a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi
239a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyi dad stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
239a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
239a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
239a7('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
239a8('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
239b1('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / 
239b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
239b3('bum): bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan
239b4('bum): to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glag/ sa bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / 
239b5('bum): kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na de bas 'di'i bsod/ nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci/ 'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
239b6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan ste/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs
239b7('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// / 
239b8('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi
240a1('bum): lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
240a2('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i
240a3('bum): lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// / 
240a4('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam
240a5('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnams yod do// cung zad/ med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 
240a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
240a7('bum): phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa
240a8('bum): nyid yod do// don dam pa med pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa
240b1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyi yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa
240b2('bum): nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par
240b3('bum): spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
240b4('bum): brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// dbasam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yo/ dad do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
240b5('bum): yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
240b6('bum): smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa
240b7('bum): rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// 
240b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa
241a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams sod do// lan cig phyir dong ba rnams song ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa
241a2('bum): rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
241a3('bum): rnams yod do// ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de
241a4('bum): dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la lus gtan bzhi la pa kod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
241a5('bum): shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ 
241a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
241a7('bum): phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
241a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 
241b1('bum): 'jug par 'gyu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// 
241b2('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ 
241b3('bum): nga byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 
241b4('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs
241b5('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko ru shi ka zag pa med pa'i/ chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
241b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
241b7('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang // 
241b8('bum): 'dus pa stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
242a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po mang/ 
242a2('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
242a3('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 
242a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa du ga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
242a5('bum): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa/ bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / 
242a6('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam
242a7('bum): grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gleg ba du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas
242a8('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ 
242b1('bum): de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gis rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
242b2('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul
242b3('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod ngo // tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
242b4('bum): yong ngo do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang dgi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i
242b5('bum): lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i
242b6('bum): lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i
242b7('bum): lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
242b8('bum): rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha/ 
243a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi/
