295b5('bum): bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / len pa mi sdu ga go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
295b6('bum): srid pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ srid pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston srid pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston srid pa mi sdug go zhes bya
295b7('bum): bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / srid pa mi
295b8('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// srid pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// srid pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// srid pa mi sdug
296a1('bum): ces bya ba rtog par 'gyuro// de lta ga/ slong pa ma rtag gnas bya bar rtog pa dang / phred pa sdug bsngal mnas bya ba gom pa dang / sring pa ba dag me dang/ 
296a2('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / srid pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// skye ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ skye ba
296a3('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ skye ba bdag med do zhes bya bar ston// skye ba mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
296a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang skye ba mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
296a5('bum): skye ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// skye ba mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag skye ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye bsdug
296a6('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye ba bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / skye ba mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la
296a7('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro// rga shi mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rga shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rga shi bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rga shi mi sdug go zhes bya bar
296a8('bum): ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do nas brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang rga shi mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur// 
296b1('bum): rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rga shi bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rga shi mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltang de dag rga shi mi rtag
296b2('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rga shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rga shi bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rga shi mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
296b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar
296b4('bum): ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa na
296b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sbyin
296b6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug ces bya bar
296b7('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
296b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
297a1('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya/ 
297a2('bum): bar ston tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa
297a3('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
297a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshul
297a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog para' gyur ro// de ltar de dag tshul khrims kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
297a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med de zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar
297a7('bum): rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston bzod pa'i pha rol tu
297a8('bum): phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 
297b1('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ sul bstan pa de dag kyang bdod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog
297b2('bum): par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
297b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
297b4('bum): tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes
297b5('bum): bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston// 
297b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar stonabartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
297b7('bum): pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang
297b8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha
298a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
298a2('bum): de ltar de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang brtson 'grus
298a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs
298a4('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ bas dam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar
298a5('bum): ston bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do// zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan gyi nga rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing
298a6('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
298a7('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog
298a8('bum): par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
298b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
298b2('bum): phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar
298b3('bum): ston/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston// shes rab kyi pha rol
298b4('bum): tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha pharol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de// su
298b5('bum): la bstan pa de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
298b6('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
298b7('bum): de ltar de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha/ 
298b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la
299a1('bum): spyod par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar spyod/ nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal mo zhes bya dang ston/ nang stong pa nyid bdag med/ 
299a2('bum): do zhes bya bar ston/ nang stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do nas brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang
299a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
299a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag nang stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
299a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par
299a6('bum): 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston phyi stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston
299a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cinga'adi skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod zhes brjod desu la bstan pa de
299a8('bum): dag kyang phyi steng pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar
299b1('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag go nas bya bar rtog pa dang / byi stong
299b2('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang phyi stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi
299b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ 
299b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston phyi nang stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cid / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha
299b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la ba snyan pa de dag kyangaphyi nang stong pa'i da mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi nang
299b6('bum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
299b7('bum): ro// de ltar de dag phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag
299b8('bum): med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid sto
300a1('bum): panyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya ba
300a2('bum): ston/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ sul bstan
300a3('bum): bde dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa
300a4('bum): nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyu der ro// de ltar de dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag
300a5('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa ste nga sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
300a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston
300a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag med zhes bya bar ston/ chen po stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston 'di skad du gang
300a8('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ sul bstan pa de dag kyang chen po ston pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
300b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rto/ 
300b2('bum): par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang chen po
300b3('bum): stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dngachen po stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
300b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag
300b5('bum): med do zhes bya bar ston don dam pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad/ du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
300b6('bum): pa la spyod do zhes brjod de su la bstan pa de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya
300b7('bum): pabar rtog par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag don
300b8('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya ba
301a1('bum): rtog pa dang / don dpa pa stong panyid kyi sdug gnas bya ba rdzog pas shes rab kyi mas na pa gzugs panas spyod par 'argya
301a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma rtag gnas bya ba sto/ 'dus byas stong ba nyid sdug bsngam ma shes bya bar stan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid padag med de shes bya bar hU~M/ 'dus byas
301a3('bum): nyid drug sanas byab 'di skad du gang da dre pa ni/ shes rab kyi jos byin pa la myong gis rjod de/ yul brten pa dngas ca
301a4('bum): kyis snang bzhi ma rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bu ba sa/ dab 'gyu ma/ 'dus byas spyong pa nyid bdag med ces byab/ 
301a5('bum): ga pa yu ma/ 'a sung+yas gang pashid sdu/ nges bya ba rdeg par gyuraro// des nga / 'dusu byas kyang pa ma rtog gshes bya bar rtag pa dang / 
301a6('bum): su byas cing nyid drug bsngal me zhes pa ba dag pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med shes byabang rtog pa dang / 'dus byas stong ba nyid sdug sazhes bya ba dag
301a7('bum): la myed rdus pan skyed 'o// 'dus pa byas stong shid ga sa sna'adum ma mang rdzug rdza
301a8('bum): banasu ma rgyas kyang nyid bdag 'di shes byab co/ 'jugs byas stong pa nyid mi drug ginas bya ba sa'adi gad du ge su rung ban
301b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de nas brjodade sul bstan pa de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong / 
301b2('bum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog
301b3('bum): pabar 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus
301b4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid bdag medo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar to/ dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzug
301b5('bum): brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar
301b6('bum): ston mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang
301b7('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya/ 
301b8('bum): bapar rtog par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog par
302a1('bum): 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi
302a2('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
302a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med
302a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo// zhes bya bar ston/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
302a5('bum): nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
302a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
302a7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar
302a8('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog/ 
302b1('bum): ba dang thog ma da pa ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyis
302b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dong ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston
302b3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi
302b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la snyan pa de dag kyang deng ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag/ ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
302b5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyu ra ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya ba
302b6('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
302b7('bum): dong ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pasashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
302b8('bum): gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston
303a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi
303a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro// 
303a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang // 
303a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang // rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ 
303a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug
303a6('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod
303a7('bum): ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos thams
303a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar
303b1('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams
303b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 
303b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ 
303b4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag
303b5('bum): kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag zhes bya ba/ ra rtog par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid snga/ ga bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan
303b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa
303b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
303b8('bum): mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mi dmigs pa stong/ 
304a1('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar spyon// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya ba spyon mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar spyon ci
304a2('bum): 'a'adi skad du gang de ltar spyod pa nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
304a3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya
304a4('bum): bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mi dmigs pa ste/ rang ba nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa
304a5('bum): dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya nga/ ra rtog pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyi sdu ga zhes bya bar rtog pasashes rab k+Shi pha rol
304a6('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa stong
304a7('bum): pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ 
304a8('bum): su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
304b1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtago zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med
304b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi
304b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med/ 
304b4('bum): do zhes bya bar ston/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya/ dbar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ sul
304b5('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya 'o/ rtog par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug/ bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa
304b6('bum): nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
304b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes
304b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo
305a1('bum): zhes bya bar na dngas bamad pa'ang ba nyid byung banyid bdag nas byab da/ rnam tha ma dpa' banang kyang ba zhi mi sdug gnas bya bar sto cang / 'din dang
305a2('bum): gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos
305a3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi
305a4('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dngos po/ med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog/ ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
305a5('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/ de bdag med de zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dngos ni ming pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ 
305a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dran pa
305a7('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ 
305a8('bum): zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur// 
305b1('bum): dran pa nye bar banag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtag par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar banag pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag
305b2('bum): go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag
305b3('bum): ba rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par
305b4('bum): spong ba rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston yang dag par spong ba rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 
305b5('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya/ na ba la spyod do zhes brjod de/ sul bstan pa de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya ba
305b6('bum): rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong
305b7('bum): pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa
305b8('bum): dang yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la
306a1('bum): / spyod par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya ba stson/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal la zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
306a2('bum): bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang da ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la
306a3('bum): bstan pa de dag kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi
306a4('bum): rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog/ dpar 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi
306a5('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsnga'o zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi/ rkang pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya ba'i rtog
306a6('bum): ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi sdug zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 
306a7('bum): dbang po rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ dbang po rnams mi sdug go zhes bya ba
306a8('bum): ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par
306b1('bum): 'gyur/ dang brnams sdug bsnga zhes bya bang dag par 'gyuraro// dbang po rnams bdag med cas byu nga rtag par gyu ro// dang rnams pa sdug ces byang chug
306b2('bum): 'gyur//  dweg nga ba rnams mi ga gnas bya ba gag pa dang / dang brnams sdug bsngal le zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dang du rnams padag med de nas byab
306b3('bum): bdang / dbang po rnams pa sdug gonas bya ba rtag sashes rab kyi pha ro phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// spobs rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar gyun/ 
306b4('bum): rnams sdug bsngal mo zhes bya ba sto/ spobs nas ngas bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ skabs rnams kyi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skang du gang de ltar spyong pa
306b5('bum): shes rabagyi pa sa phyin pa la byed nas brjod/ yul bstan pa de dag stobs rnams mi go ces bya ba rtog par 'gyur// rtsubs rnams sdus
306b6('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag stobs rnams mi
306b7('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / stobs rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog
306b8('bum): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo// 
307a1('bum): zhes bya bar rnan/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med do nas bya bar byen/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug gi zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skang dug dang
307a2('bum): stang spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi
307a3('bum): yan lag rnams sdug bsngal nas bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya ba rdeg par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog
307a4('bum): par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / byang chub
307a5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams bdag med de zhes bya bar rtog pa dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi sdug go nas bya bar rtog/ bsashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs parnyan
307a6('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston 'phags pa'i
307a7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni
307a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam
307b1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi
307b2('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes
307b3('bum): bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab
307b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar s+ho// na'adegs pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal lo
307b5('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ 'phags pa'i bden pa/ mas mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de
307b6('bum): ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i
307b7('bum): bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi sdug
307b8('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngalo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i
308a1('bum): bden pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
308a2('bum): la spyod par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ bsam gtan rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar
308a3('bum): ston bsam gtan rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan
308a4('bum): pa de dag kyangabasam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams sdug pa dasngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams
308a5('bum): bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de lta rade dag bsam gtan rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa
308a6('bum): dang bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / bsam gtan rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab
308a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ tshad med pa rnams bdag medo
308a8('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ tshad med pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / 
308b1('bum): tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
308b2('bum): tshad med pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag tshad med pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang
308b3('bum): tshad med pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / tshad med pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// gzugs
308b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
308b5('bum): pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston gzugs med pa'i/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi
308b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
308b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
308b8('bum): 'jug pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
309a1('bum): pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
309a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag go/ 
309a3('bum): zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya
309a4('bum): bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag
309a5('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro// 
309a6('bum): rnam por thar pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa
309a7('bum): dang rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur
309a8('bum): ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mthar
309b1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod
309b2('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
309b3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur// 
309b4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug ce des bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mthar gyi dganas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtog go zhes bya bar
309b5('bum): rtog pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag
309b6('bum): med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyuraro// 
309b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
309b8('bum): smon pa med pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam par thar pa'i
310a1('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
310a2('bum): do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sku
310a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med
310a4('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyi dad dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar
310a5('bum): de dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa da / smon pa med pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
310a6('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
310a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// 
310a8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston// mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ mngon par shes
310b1('bum): ba rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mngon par shes
310b2('bum): pab rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro// 
310b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal la
310b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi
310b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston
310b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes
310b7('bum): brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ting nge
310b8('bum): 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
311a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
311a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston
311a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med de zhes bya bar sten/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes
311a4('bum): brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyuraro// 
311a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog para'agyur ro// de ltar de dag gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag go/ 
311a6('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi sdug go// 
311a7('bum): zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs
311a8('bum): ba'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 
311b1('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do nas brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par
311b2('bum): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
311b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
311b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
311b5('bum): stobs rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ra ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ 
311b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du
311b7('bum): gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mi
311b8('bum): 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur// 
312a1('bum): de ltar de dag mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
312a2('bum): bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// / 
312a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po brgya so gsum pa// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa
312a4('bum): rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar s+ho// naso so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi sdug go
312a5('bum): zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod desu la bstan pa de dag kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi
312a6('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
312a7('bum): ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
312a8('bum): rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas
312b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po bdag med do zhes
312b2('bum): bya bar ston/ snying rje chen po mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang
312b3('bum): snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar rtag par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po mi
312b4('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag snying rje chen po mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen
312b5('bum): bi bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / snying rje chen po mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// sangs
312b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag med do zhes bya bar
312b7('bum): ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de
312b8('bum): dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
313a1('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sangs
313a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
313a3('bum): bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu
313a4('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun tu/ zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ 
313a5('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de
313a6('bum): dag kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
313a7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
313a8('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya
313b1('bum): bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
313b2('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing 'di skad du gang
313b3('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod zhes brjod/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong
313b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// nga lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med ces bya bar rtog/  par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug
313b5('bum): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
313b6('bum): bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
313b7('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
313b8('bum): 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ 
314a1('bum): su la bstan pa de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par/ 
314a2('bum): 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
314a3('bum): bu mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / phyir mi
314a4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes da rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston// 
314a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston dgra bcom pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing
314a6('bum): 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dgra
314a7('bum): bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// 
314a8('bum): de ltar de dag dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / 
314b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang
314b2('bum): chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rang byang chub bdag med do zhes bya bar ston rang byang chub mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi
314b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bstan pa de dag kyang / rang byang chub mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang
314b4('bum): byang chub bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rang byang chub mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang
314b5('bum): chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chubab bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rang byang chubami sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
314b6('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
314b7('bum): pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang da ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ 
314b8('bum): su la bstan pa de dag kyang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam
315a1('bum): ba shes pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi
315a2('bum): rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes
315a3('bum): pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams
315a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston
315a5('bum): cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/ su la bsta/ na ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi
315a6('bum): rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur
315a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
315a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi sdug go zhes bya bar
315b1('bum): rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi
315b2('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na/ 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
315b3('bum): tu phyin pa sgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa
315b4('bum): dang sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad da pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
315b5('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
315b6('bum): sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// 
315b7('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// / 
315b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la
316a1('bum): gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa
316a2('bum): dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / 
316a3('bum): sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa dang / byang chub
316a4('bum): sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / das bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa badz+ra/ 
316a5('bum): ba dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa btsud gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'il tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
316a6('bum): phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa
316a7('bum): dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur zhes/ de yang mtshan ma'i tshul dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston te/ de dus kyi 'du shes kyis
316a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms par gyur te/ ko'u shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub
316b1('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig
316b2('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// zhes ston te/ ko'u na
316b3('bum): ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
316b4('bum): bu mo de dag pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na/ 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes dab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snyoms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod
316b5('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byachub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// khyod
316b6('bum): kyis de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
316b7('bum): rnams la/ rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / pu dud dang / mchod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ 
316b8('bum): byang chub sems dngapa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la stod na/ 'digad ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun du
317a1('bum): par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
317a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
317a3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
317a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
317a5('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ sa su dga' bar bgyis la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngos shig ces
317a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag de ltar ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston na/ 
317a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston pa lags bcom
317a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mod dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi
317b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
317b2('bum): gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
317b3('bum): phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmig so// de la gzugs nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa
317b4('bum): lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rig nas kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi
317b5('bum): kagazhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu me de dag/ byung chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
317b6('bum): ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba ni rang bzhin
317b7('bum): gyis stong ste/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
317b8('bum): yin pa de la ni/ tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmig so// de la tshor ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la med ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i/ 
318a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mad dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko ru shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
318a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms
318a3('bum): shig/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// / 
318a4('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu na pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces
318a5('bum): bya bar mi dmigs so// de la 'du shes nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
318a6('bum): dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
318a7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta
318a8('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos pa med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa don// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 
318b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'du byed rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs so// de la 'du byed nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta/ 
318b2('bum): ga la yod ces ston to// ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan
318b3('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te
318b4('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo/ mas shig/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
318b5('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnabar shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
318b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la
318b7('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa ltag la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab
318b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
319a1('bum): bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
319a2('bum): shig/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mig gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// / 
319a3('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mig rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba
319a4('bum): mi dmigs so// de la ni mig nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ dko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
319a5('bum): de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs/ brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rig/ sa kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
319a6('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rna ba mi
319a7('bum): rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang
319a8('bum): yin pa den/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// 
319b1('bum): de la rna ba nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
319b2('bum): ba'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
319b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sna mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lha/ 
319b4('bum): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna ni rang bzhin gyi stong ste/ sna'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni
319b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la sna nyid kyang med na/ 
319b6('bum): rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// 
319b7('bum): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol
319b8('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lce mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i
320a1('bum): pa// sa kha tu ga/ shes pa kyi sa ldan pa gang yin na/ skye d+hag ces bya babam mi rtag ces byab mi migs so// des
320a2('bum): pam pa tag pasngags sa 'an gas kyi su gas me da/ sas kyi ma byon pa'i ga
320a3('bum): na maldan / garu shig gzhan yang / sa kyi bu nga rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub sems da theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu nga rigs kyi bu ma dag shes
320a4('bum): pa ma tu phyin pa 'di sa ston/ rung gi/ kyi bu khyed kyisashes rab kyi pa ral na bsgoms shig/ sus mi rtag ces bya ba
320a5('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir na na/ lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de na/ 
320a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la lus nyid kyang med na/ 
320a7('bum): rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa sdig la med ces da te/ kau shi ga de sar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu me dgan shes ba kyi tsun pa'i gzugs pananas
320b1('bum): mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi
320b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig
320b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa don shes
320b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni yid rtag das bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// 
320b5('bum): de la yid nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rig sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab
320b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs
320b7('bum): kyi bu med dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston tetshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms shig/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba
320b8('bum): yang dag par rjes sum lta shig/ da tso phyi zhen/ gdugs ni ring bzhin gyis stong / gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pade ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos so/ 
321a1('bum): med bu gang yin bden sa rab kyi rol tu phyin pa ste shes rab kyi cwos pa gang yin pa zhi
321a2('bum): gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs sa/ de la gzugs nyid kyang med/ drug pa'am mi rtag palcag la med ces ston/ gadzu sha kAr
321a3('bum): sna ston pa'i rigs zla'as rags kyi bu mo dag ni/ shes rab kyi pa rab tu phyin pa'i gzugs parnyan mi snyed te/ Ta sha~M kagazhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bum dag
321a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i mig pa pa'i rigs kyi bu / sa kyi ma dgashes rab byed pa nga/ chu gas kyi bu
321a5('bum): shes rab kyi ro phyin pa pashig/ ska mi tag ces bya yang dgag rjes sum/ po'i phyi shi na
321a6('bum): /  na na pa da dus pa da la'as pa nga ga med pa / sa

321a8('bum): zug gas kyi tshu la gas kyi sa tshun zugs rnams/  dzas tha
321b1('bum): bu mod dgalashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chung rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pasgoms shig/ drim rtag ces bya bar yang

321b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dri rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la dri nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi

321b5('bum): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

321b7('bum): gyis stong ste/ ro'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la
321b8('bum): ro rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la ro nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi
322a1('bum): gas ky-i ma dgan shes rab kyi yos ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan masta tu/ kaudu shika gzhan
322a2('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te
322a3('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyisashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgongs shig/ deg mi rtag ces bya ba snang dag par rjes sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen reg ni rang bzhin gyis stong / 
322a4('bum): stereg gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po ma pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi
322a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni reg tug/ ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la reg nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa
322a6('bum): ltag la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dgashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u
322a7('bum): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te
322a8('bum): chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skems shig/ chos mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na chos rang bzhin gyi
322b1('bum): stong ste/ chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
322b2('bum): byiphyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chos rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la chos nyid kyang medan/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ 
322b3('bum): ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang
322b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dgabyang chub sems dpa'i theg dab pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te
322b5('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir/ 
322b6('bum): zhe na mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes
