350b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngas po med pa'o// dngos pa
350b4('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi
350b5('bum): rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang medan gapa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
350b6('bum): ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
350b7('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
350b8('bum): rang kyi rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bye bar yang dag par rjesum lta shigade ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
351a1('bum): 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// 
351a2('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya
351a3('bum): ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang medan/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston tu
351a4('bum): ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ded dge na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gas
351a5('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dang / ga la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston
351a6('bum): chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i
351a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// 
351a8('bum): dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag
351b1('bum): ces bya ba 'am ma rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang med/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la sod ces ston te/ 
351b2('bum): ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs
351b3('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
351b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ phyir mi 'ong dnga'i 'bras bu mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes sum lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
351b5('bum): 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos pom/ da pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni
351b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa des ni phyi ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'ang mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so/ 
351b7('bum): del phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lcag la yod ces ston/ dz+ra shi ka de k+Shar sbyin pa'i rigs kyi bu'ang rigs kyi bu mo dag / 
351b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro tu phyin pa'i gzugs parnyan ma sbyinaH/ kau ru shig gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mi de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dbems
352a1('bum): kyi bu mod dgalashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
352a2('bum): sgoms shog/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dgra bcom
352a3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa den/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
352a4('bum): pa de la ni dgra bcom pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'i yang ma mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la dgra pa tsam pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta
352a5('bum): gal yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston
352a6('bum): to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ 
352a7('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rang byang chub mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang byang chub
352a8('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 
352b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rang byang chub rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la rang byang chub nyid kyang med na
352b2('bum): pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u
352b3('bum): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
352b4('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom das shig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ 
352b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe nalam gyis rnam pa shesapa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
352b6('bum): dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces
352b7('bum): bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kro'u shi ka de ltar ston
352b8('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
353a1('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
353a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong
353a3('bum): sternam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste// shes rab
353a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la rnam pa thams cad
353a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston/ ko'u shi ke de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
353a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
353a7('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chos gang las kyang yongs su 'da' bar ma byed
353a8('bum): cig/ chos gang la yang gnas par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am/ gang / 
353b1('bum): la gnas par bya ba'i chos de la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang yin pa
353b2('bum): de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ blang bar bya ba 'am/ 
353b3('bum): dor bar bya ba 'am/ bskyed par bya ba 'am/ dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yang med do zhes ston te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ 
353b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// / ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan par byas te/ 
353b5('bum): ko'u shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga
353b6('bum): ma dag gi ni ma yin no// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
353b7('bum): 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
353b8('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsi ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
354a1('bum): rab tu phyin pa 'didon dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la cher brjod/ bstan pa dang bshad de bkrob na
354a2('bum): rnam par bye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa/ 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun nub
354a3('bum): bar gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces
354a4('bum): bskon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par
354a5('bum): 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi semasacan lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig/ rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi
354a6('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
354a7('bum): de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
354a8('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de/ bstan pa dang
354b1('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
354b2('bum): zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan
354b3('bum): gyis shig/ ces bsgon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod
354b4('bum): bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jigra rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gos ko'u shi
354b5('bum): ka stong gis 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi/ bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
354b6('bum): bu la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
354b7('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis// shes rab kyi
354b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan
355a1('bum): bar byas pa dang / 'di skad du nur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ rmongs sheg/ 
355a2('bum): lhogs shig/ sum bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yonan tan du gyis shig/ cis bsgron/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du
355a3('bum): 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems
355a4('bum): can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ dko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyis khams la dbring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs
355a5('bum): kyi bu ma la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkodanako'u shika/ de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyibu
355a6('bum): mi de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba
355a7('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan le rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad / 
355a8('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pazung shig/ kun
355b1('bum): chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces sgon
355b2('bum): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka
355b3('bum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji
355b4('bum): snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am
355b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel la mgasol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
355b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka debs kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod
355b7('bum): de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
355b8('bum): phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig
356a1('bum): ces bsgon/ sa da'i ba mdunapas mang du phes lo// dpa bya na/  na ka shes bkyi pa sa na pa 'di las rgyun tu grus
356a2('bum): rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko ru shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka
356a3('bum): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dgarigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
356a4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na dko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi dbu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
356a5('bum): 'phel lam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma nga ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba ko'u shi ke de
356a6('bum): bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol
356a7('bum): zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis
356a8('bum): shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgon ches
356b1('bum): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka
356b2('bum): yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na
356b3('bum): ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
356b4('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bkada' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
356b5('bum): tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhi nga rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / 
356b6('bum): yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin
356b7('bum): du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na
356b8('bum): ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
357a1('bum): bkod pa lta zhog gi/ gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
357a2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkodan ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol
357a3('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ 
357a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang lnga na par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba
357a5('bum): dang yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha ro/ phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig
357a6('bum): chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i
357a7('bum): bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gling chen
357a8('bum): po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu
357b1('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
357b2('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang / 
357b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de/ bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam
357b4('bum): par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa bya/ sa pa dang 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub
357b5('bum): bar gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig
357b6('bum): ces bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par
357b7('bum): 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems
357b8('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am
358a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom
358a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
358a3('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
358a4('bum): zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan
358a5('bum): du gyis shig ces bsgon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams
358a6('bum): yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
358a7('bum): bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji
358a8('bum): snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus ma du 'phel lam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom
358b1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko ru shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan pa
358b2('bum): rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
358b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid bzung shig/ kun chub par thos shig/ tshangs shig rdzogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yidal gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
358b4('bum): tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bskon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan
358b5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau'u shi ka stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems canalan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ 
358b6('bum): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji srid pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir
358b7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko ru shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos sod rnams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan
358b8('bum): 'das mang ngo // bde ba gshegs su mang ngo // bcom ldan 'dis kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau ru shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'ang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes / 
359a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang /

359a5('bum): sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyibu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'dra/ a pu la rab tu bkod na ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
359a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis

359a8('bum): bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

359b7('bum): dang bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshu re rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
359b8('bum): phyin bzung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du
360a1('bum): gyis shig ces bskon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ koru shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba/ 
360a2('bum): rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung
360a3('bum): bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs
360a4('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du dpal lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das

360b1('bum): kastong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am

360b3('bum): mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu
360b4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu nga phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher nga brjod de bsten pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye/

360b8('bum): gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa lta zhog gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji

361a2('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das

361b1('bum): gdun d+ha gag dang skas dus sa/ gas kyi ma gas khrim ma pas da sa ma du ma / gsol pa/ na na sa

362a1('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gisashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yige dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang

362a5('bum): bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka 'adz+ra ma bu'i gling gi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa/ lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi

362b1('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzung
362b2('bum): shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig

362b4('bum): shika gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag
362b5('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na ko'u ni ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
362b6('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
362b7('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang bshad de
362b8('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste/ gsal pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha ril tu phyin pazung shig/ kun
363a1('bum): chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
363a2('bum): la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams
363a3('bum): yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems
363a4('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am
363a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das
363a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan
363a7('bum): pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
363a8('bum): byin pazung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du
363b1('bum): gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// 
363b2('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji
363b3('bum): snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
363b4('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegangs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
363b5('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang / ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang
363b6('bum): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzung
363b7('bum): shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces
363b8('bum): bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// 
364a1('bum): ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re yang
364a2('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na
364a3('bum): ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde
364a4('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi
364a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de/ bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang
364a6('bum): yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ 
364a7('bum): lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams
364a8('bum): mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i
364b1('bum): gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
364b2('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
364b3('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang bshad/ 
364b4('bum): de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang 8// yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skadadu tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
364b5('bum): phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shigachongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
364b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs
364b7('bum): rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
364b8('bum): ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu/ 
365a1('bum): mad sod sa du rgyus med du pas sagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang // bde ba gshegs dam
365a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa koru shi ka da bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan pa
365a3('bum): gzhanal rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad da krol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu
365a4('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung ga/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tshangs shig/ rdzogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig
365a5('bum): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lanan ta/ du gyis shog ces bskon/ ches de'i bson/ mas mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
365a6('bum): ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub
365a7('bum): la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rang byang chub la rab tu bkod/ 
365a8('bum): ko 'u shi ka ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
365b1('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
365b2('bum): don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 
365b3('bum): 'di skad du chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyisashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin
365b4('bum): du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du kyi shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i
365b5('bum): phyir zhe na ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'a/ gyur ro// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi
365b6('bum): khams byung bu'i sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
365b7('bum): la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ 
365b8('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas
366a1('bum): lags zu'ang dgas sa bu mog gsashes pa ma tsun pa 'a nga ldan pa ge na pas
366a2('bum): brjod bstan pa dang bgad de dkrol zhi rnam par byeste/ gsas pa dang yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du chu tshigs kyis
366a3('bum): sa ky-i ma rdzun bzung shi/ ku rgyu par gyis shig/ chos ga/ sngags so// rdul bzhin du 'ad la rgyas shA
366a4('bum): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bskonaches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//  ci'i
366a5('bum): phyi shinakoSh+Ta sha~M ka shes rab kyi'o// rol tu phyin pa 'di las// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// ko'u shig steng gnyis
366a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag
366a7('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkodan/ ko 'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am
366a8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // 
366b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang
366b2('bum): ldan yige dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 
366b3('bum): 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ rdul bzhin
366b4('bum): du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i sha/ res rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgom ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// 
366b5('bum): deci phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ dpar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong
366b6('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
366b7('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gi/ rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
366b8('bum): bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
